item.title: Ethically Aware Recommender Systems in Social Media
item.description: This post is based on an article I wrote some time ago; There may be some inconsistencies with the references, sorry. Reccomender Systems In a world where digital information is increasing every year, recommender systems are very important tools to handle the challenge of information overload. A recommender system is a type of information filtering system with the ability to filter information from a large amount of data generated dynamically, according to a given preference, observed behavior or interest from the user [1].
